subject: Concussions
lead_paragraph: Ravens running back Willis McGahee said doctors told him he would make a full recovery from a fierce helmet-to-helmet hit in the A.F.C. championship game that had him carted off the field.
snippet: Ravens running back Willis McGahee said doctors told him he would make a full recovery from a fierce helmet-to-helmet hit in the A.F.C. championship game that had him carted off the field.
